modified_SQL_query: SELECT EQ(@RunId, RUNID) FROM QRM.Run_Time_Description WHERE AND(AND(AND(AND(EQ(Portfolio, @PortfolioCurrent), EQ(TYPE_CONVERSION(date), TYPE_CONVERSION(date))), EQ(CompanyName, @CompanyName)), COMPARE(RunParameter, ('Val_shock', 'Val_shock_old', 'CSRBB'))), EQ(ISDATE(Market), 1))
